name: Pear & Berry Cooler Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2L sparkling mineral water or soda water

recipeInstructions.text: Blend pear, lime juice and raspberries in a food processor or blender until smooth.
Pour into a saucepan and add sugar. Bring to the boil while stirring. Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes or until slightly reduced and syrupy.
Strain into a large jug. Chill.
Fill glasses with ice. Add 1/4 cup of syrup into each glass. Top with mineral or soda water. Serve with slices of pear, lime and mint sprigs.
